metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2383 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: dompdf.php in dompdf before 0.6.1, when DOMPDF_ENABLE_PHP is enabled,allows context-dependent attackers to bypass chroot protections and readarbitrary files via a PHP protocol and wrappers in the input_fileparameter, as demonstrated by aphp://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource in the input_fileparameter.

criterions.comment: php-dompdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
